messages.msgSnippet: Hi! Thank You for this beautiful movie :) I forwarded it to three mailing lists in Estonia. Reading these lists, uniting alltogether about 2000 people, there
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

Thank You for this beautiful movie :)
I forwarded it to three mailing lists in Estonia. Reading these lists,
uniting alltogether about 2000 people, there are lots of great people
creating better lives for their children.

Loving days
Ingrid

messages.subject: You are Love
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.youarelovemovie.com/ It speaks for itself... Hey, I want to manifest sending this video to everyone in the world on a computer today, Valentine s
messages.messageBody:
http://www.youarelovemovie.com/

It speaks for itself...




Hey, I want to manifest sending this video to everyone in the world on
a computer today, Valentine's Day. I am making it a "chain letter" to
pass on to 5 people that you love. Just *imagine* the power of this
much love in the world!! We can manifest it!

Post if you are passing the video on also, so that we can keep the
thread active and visible for 24 hours.

Share the Love on Valentine's Day!

Pat
